file1.location: starts with platform, then to the rest of the structure
file1.appends: Optional, left blank won't append to any files. wepChache prechaches the filename in _mapspawn.gnut. custom uses the custom field

custom.name: name of the file to append to
custom.location: starts with platform, then to the rest of the structure
custom.from: where does it append from, either end, or a string to make a new line and add
